subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Savannah State set N.C.A.A. records for fewest points and worst field-goal percentage in a half in the shot-clock era in a 85-25 loss to Kansas State Monday night.
snippet: Savannah State set N.C.A.A. records for fewest points and worst field-goal percentage in a half in the shot-clock era in a 85-25 loss to Kansas State Monday night.
